titleStmt.title: A divine horn-book, or, The first form in the true theosophick school wherein is taught the knowledge of Gods great name, Jeova in the House of Letters, as a good help to know God in nature and creature through the chief of sinners, the unworthiest of all Gods servants, His Majesties loyal subject, and every mans brother / by H.L.
titleStmt.author: H. L.
